Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2014 04:34AM Libby1223 wrote: I'm sorry you are going through this.  My advice would be to call your doctor.  Your antibiotics should be working by now.  They may need to do something as simple as switch your antibiotics, but I would also be persistent about further work up if the symptoms continue. Hope you are feeling better soon!
Posts.Title: I am not sure if this is mastitis anymore WeepyOne Libby1223

Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2015 04:56PM Libby1223 wrote: I also had a complete pathological response, but the RO recommended I have radiation due to my tumor size initially and my age. I had the same type of cancer as you Stage IIB, one lymph node was involved.
Posts.Title: Is radiation required for a complete pathological response? Cldnkl Hopeful82014
